expression-projection.text: case when t.status = 'init' then '已启用' when t.status = 'failed' then '已停用' end

common-expression.text: MATCH (order_id) AGAINST (? IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE)
common-expression.literal-text: MATCH (order_id) AGAINST ('keyword' IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE)

common-expression.text: CASE WHEN order_id > ? THEN ? ELSE ? END
common-expression.literal-text: CASE WHEN order_id > 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END
